Text: DEP Filings Enrons Motions to Dismiss Amended Petitions Cc Dear Team Enron Pompano Beach This morning the attached motions to dismiss were delivered to the Agency Clerk at DEP in Tallahassee The motions seek dismissal of the amended petitions submitted by Margate the City of Coral Springs and the City of Coconut Creek respectively We will keep you apprised of any responses to our motions or DEP rulings Thanks very much Paul C Savage Greenberg Traurig PA The information contained in this transmission may contain privileged and confidential information It is intended only for the use of the persons named above If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or duplication of this communication is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message To reply to our email administrator directly please send an email to ENRONMTD COCONUT CREEKS AMENDED PETITIONDOC ENRON MTD MARGATE AMENDED PETDOC ENRONMTD CORAL SPRINGS AMENDED PETITIONDOC

Updated DEP and DOAH Procedural History Re Pompano Beach and Deerfield Administrative ProceedingsENRONMEMO TO STEVEN KRIMSKYvDOC Dear Team Enron Pompano Beach and Deerfield Attached is an updated recitation of the procedural history thus far of the Pompano Beach and Deerfield administrative proceedings Thank you very much Paul C Savage Greenberg Traurig PA ph fax The information contained in this transmission may contain privileged and confidential information It is intended only for the use of the persons named above If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or duplication of this communication is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message To reply to our email administrator directly please send an email to

ENRONPOMPANOMOTION TO STRIKE AND DISMISS PETITIONS FOR FORMAL ADMINISTRATIVE HEARINGvDOCENRONPOMPANOMOTION TO STRIKE AND DISMISS PETITIONS FOR FORMAL ADMINISTRATIVE HEARINGvDOC Dear Team Enron Pompano Beach Attached is our motion to strike andor dismiss Coral Springs second amended petition Because the petition is substantially the same as those previously submitted in this action and in the Deerfield action you will recognize our motion to dismiss arguments A new argument appears however on the first five pages of the motion wherein we argue that it was improper for Coral Springs to have submitted a second amended petition well past the DEPs imposed deadline We ask the administrative law judge to accordingly strike the second amended petition and refuse to consider it We would like to send this out this evening for filing with DOAH tomorrow Please forward any comments or suggestions you have by the close of business today if possible Thank you very much Paul C Savage Greenberg Traurig PA ph fax The information contained in this transmission may contain privileged and confidential information It is intended only for the use of the persons named above If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or duplication of this communication is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message To reply to our email administrator directly please send an email to

POMPANORESONSE TO BROWARD COUNTYS MOTION TO INTERVENEvDOC Cc POMPANORESONSE TO BROWARD COUNTYS MOTION TO INTERVENEvDOC Dear Enron Pompano DOAH Team Attached is our response to Browards motion to intervene in the Pompano DOAH proceeding The requirements for an intervention motion are the same by rule as are those for petitions so you will recognize the arguments from our motions to dismiss Please pass along any comments before Monday evening if possible Thanks very much Paul C Savage Greenberg Traurig PA ph fax The information contained in this transmission may contain privileged and confidential information It is intended only for the use of the persons named above If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or duplication of this communication is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message To reply to our email administrator directly please send an email to
